sentence.Network_en: The debate seems, in retrospect, to have been fixed from the beginning.
sentence.Network_cn: 回想起来，这场辩论好像从一开始就被人操纵了。

sentence.Network_en: It was , in retrospect, the happiest day of her life.
sentence.Network_cn: 回想起来, 那是她一生最幸福的日子.

sentence.Network_en: In retrospect it's obvious how we went wrong.
sentence.Network_cn: 回想起来,我们是如何出的错就很明显了.

jx.jx_en_mean: Looking backward or reviewing the past.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from retro- 'back', on the pattern of the noun prospect

entry.def: When you consider something in retrospect, you think about it afterwards, and often have a different opinion about it from the one that you had at the time.

example.ex: In retrospect, I wish that I had thought about alternative courses of action...
example.tran: 回想起来，我真希望自己当时考虑过其他做法。

example.ex: It was a very strange feeling in retrospect — I was frightened, but excited at the same time.
example.tran: 回想起来那是一种非常奇怪的感觉——我当时既害怕又兴奋。

means.word_mean: 1. look back upon (a period of time, sequence of events, etc.); remember;

auth_sentence.content: In retrospect, I don't find it surprising.
auth_sentence.res_content: In retrospect, I don't find it surprising.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In retrospect, I don't find it surprising.

auth_sentence.content: My earlier sojourn in the Hebrides...in retrospect seemed episodic.
auth_sentence.res_content: My earlier sojourn in the Hebrides...in retrospect seemed episodic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My earlier sojourn in the Hebrides...in retrospect seemed episodic.

auth_sentence.content: In retrospect, we had time to educate ourselves.
auth_sentence.res_content: In retrospect, we had time to educate ourselves.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In retrospect, we had time to educate ourselves.

spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出

pro前面+spect看→向前看→前景
